title: Hey Riot, after the updates... cannot play
body: After the most recent auto updates from the game client, I am having a non-stop "movement delay bug",  I keep disconnecting and reconnecting during a game... which resulting me a 2 seconds BS ridiculous "movement delay bug" . Literally cannot play under such condition.... WTF RIOT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! What did you do this time

replies.body:
This definitely *doesn't* sound like something that could have been caused by a patch or update, as the symptoms you've described are common to *Packet Loss* issues. I'd recommend taking a go at our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), which typically resolves these sorts of issues.

Let me know if you see any changes occur as a result of those steps taken.
